_header: While thou hast good and gettest good for good thou might be held
Bibliographic Ghosts: Cambridge UK, Trinity College O.9.38 (1450), f. 39v: see 6546.
_description: A riddling discussion on ‘Good’ — four 10-line stanzas (ababababcc) with internal rhyme and ‘0 and I’ refrain element in the 9th line
